triples.evidence: A radiologist, with years of training and experience, carefully reviews CT scans and X-rays.
This highlights why task-specific measures are so important.

triples.o: sensitivity, specificity, ROC curves, and observer studies
triples.evidence: So in this part of the lecture, we’ll look at task-specific measures such as sensitivity, specificity, ROC curves, and observer studies, which are all designed to assess performance in clinical terms rather than engineering terms.
